glsa.title: Cyrus-SASL: DIGEST-MD5 Pre-Authentication Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: Cyrus-SASL contains a vulnerability in the DIGEST-MD5 process that could lead to a Denial of Service.

background.p: Cyrus-SASL is an implementation of the Simple Authentication and Security Layer.

description.p: Cyrus-SASL contains an unspecified vulnerability in the DIGEST-MD5 process that could lead to a Denial of Service.

impact.p: An attacker could possibly exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted data stream to the Cyrus-SASL server, resulting in a Denial of Service even if the attacker is not able to authenticate.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Cyrus-SASL users should upgrade to the latest version:
